Package io.reinert.gdeferred

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlwaysCallback<D,F>
    Callback always executed in promises.
    Deferred<D,F,P>
    Deferred interface to trigger an event (resolve, reject, notify).
    DoneCallback<D>
    Callback executed when a promise succeeds.
    DoneFilter<D,D_OUT>  
    DonePipe<D,D_OUT,F_OUT,P_OUT>  
    FailCallback<F>
    Callback executed when a promise fails.
    FailFilter<F,F_OUT>  
    FailPipe<F,D_OUT,F_OUT,P_OUT>  
    ProgressCallback<P>  
    ProgressFilter<P,P_OUT>  
    ProgressPipe<P,D_OUT,F_OUT,P_OUT>  
    Promise<D,F,P>
    Promise interface to observe when some action has occurred on the corresponding Deferred object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Promise.State
    State of a Promise
